entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING ENDED, Kugluktuk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:05 a.m. MDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 12:08 AM MDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 12:08 AM MDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 12:08 AM MDT Friday 28 April 2023
